name: desk-ui
description: HTML front-end for visualization (3D objects and medical images)
author: Sebastien Valette <sebastien.valette@creatis.insa-lyon.fr> (http://www.creatis.insa-lyon.fr/~valette)

scripts.qooxdoo: python generate.py source && python generate.py build && python generate.py api
scripts.clean: rm -rf build && rm -rf api && rm -rf source/script/desk.ui.*
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run browserify && npm run qooxdoo
scripts.updateAll: rm -rf node_modules && git pull && npm install && npm run build
